headline: Is TJX (TJX) Pricing Reflect Long Term Value After Strong Multi Year Share Gains
summary: If you are wondering whether TJX Companies' current share price lines up with its underlying worth, you are not alone. This article is built to help you unpack that question clearly. TJX Companies' stock most recently closed at US$158.14, with returns of 2.7% over the last 7 days, 1.3% over the last 30 days, 2.5% year to date, 34.3% over 1 year, 102.1% over 3 years and 153.5% over 5 years. Recent attention on TJX has been shaped by ongoing interest in off price retail and how consumers are...
